title: Neverending White Lights - Act I: Goodbye Friends of the Heavenl
description:
Neverending White Lights - Act I - Goodbye Friends of the Heavenly Bodies [2005]

Encoded in MP3 (256kbps)

1. From What I Once Was 	
2. Angels & Saints - feat. Chris Gordon (Deckard)
3. Age of Consent - feat. Nicholas Hexum (311)
4. Ending of a Story
5. Return Our Lives - feat. Judah Nagler (The Velvet Teen)
6. I Hope Your Heart Runs Empty
7. Little Piece - feat. Marco DiFelice (Supergarage)
8. This Longing - feat. Daniel Greaves (Doctor, The Watchmen)
9. Of All the Things You've Done Wrong - feat. Nathan Larson (Shudder to Think)
10. Tired of Saving Souls - feat. John Campsey (Sleepway)
11. How Could I Survive - feat. Sharky Laguana (Creeper Lagoon)
12. The Grace - feat. Dallas Green (Alexisonfire, City and Colour)
13. First Days of Spring
14. Liar - feat Raine Maida (Our Lady Peace)
15. Life Is a Dead Scene - feat. Todd Kerns
16. Our Final Hymn - feat. Jimmy Gnecco (Ours) 

Flatlanded gave us Act II, so to return the favor, here's Act I.  Only 256kbps rips, though, sorry about that.  This is a difficult album to get in the states, and I picked mine up as an aside while on a trip to Vancouver.


Enjoy!
